nodes.text: The Trade Federation resistance was a Separatist holdout formed from elements of the Trade Federation that did not accept being nationalized by the Galactic Empire.
The resistance held power in several locations of the former Trade Federation territory, a notable location being the Enarc system.

Following the campaign that saw the crushing of these groups, the Trade Federation was officially disbanded, though a few of its members became part of the Alliance to Restore the Republic nineteen years later.
